gov.usgs.anss.inventory

Class UC

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.util.UC
      • gov.usgs.anss.inventory.UC

  • public class UC
extends UC
    This class extends gov.usgs.anss.util.UC, which holds global constants and utility methods. This class has changes that are specific to the Inventory application.
